name: Tower of Hate
description:
TOWER OF HATE

I made this just as an exercise in my Unity learning. But even with all the design simplicity, I've wanted to give it a personal touch.

It only can be played in Android devices.

Everything you'll see in the screen is purely intentional.

CREDITS

  • Game Design: Daniel García Raso
  • Programming: Daniel García Raso
  • Music: Daniel García Raso using Aural
  • FX: Daniel García Raso & www.freesound.org (Button Click)
  • Pixelated Hatred: Daniel García Raso
  • City Background: TokyoGeisha (Menu) & acasas (Level)
  • Trash Can: Dant-e 
  • Fonts: Emil Bertell (FT Nihilist Philosophy) & Steve Cloutier (Punk Rock Show)
